name: so-called
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: used to show that you think a word that is used to describe someone or something is not suitable or not correct

example.eg: It was one of his so-called friends who supplied him with the drugs that killed him.
example.egtrans: 是他一个所谓的朋友为他提供毒品，让他丧了命。

trans_examp.trans_en: used to introduce a new word or phrase that is not yet known by many people

example.eg: It isn't yet clear how dangerous these so-called "super-rats" are.
example.egtrans: 目前还不清楚这种名叫“超级老鼠”的东西有多危险。
